title: What are some talents or skills that can take you far in life? - Quora

response.answer_text: In any field I think worth developing skills are communication skills Communication skill plays a major role in all aspects in job interview s . communication skills not only means fluent in a foreign languages like English but also means the way you explain your feelings to other.then other can understand you .you voice should be clear ,confident,loud enough in company (a group of People.

Salesmanship. No matter what career you choose. Physical attractiveness. Your career choices will have a wider selection. Integrity. It may not take you “as far” as some others, but it will maximize how “far” you go.
